features.title: Stock Experience
features.description: Experience Android in its purest form with our enhanced AOSP-based system. We've carefully crafted every detail to deliver the perfect balance of stock authenticity and Dark Elixir innovation.

features.title: Performance Boost
features.description: Unlock the true potential of your device with our advanced kernel optimizations and system tweaks. Experience smoother animations, faster app launches, and improved battery life.

features.title: Customization
features.description: Make your device truly yours with our extensive customization options. From system animations to status bar tweaks, the possibilities are endless.
